thread.title: Traveling with track team
thread.title_full: Traveling with track team - Review of Royal Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Carlia V
title: Traveling with track team
text:
The Royal Park Hotel, NYC, is the scariest place I've ever stayed. It is old, they've tried to update it a bit, but beware. There is a VACATE sign from the city of NYC posted to the front lobby glass.
There was blood on the rollaway sheets. After asking for new ones, I found large blood stains on the underside of the mattress. I requested a replacement, so my daughter could sleep in sanitary conditions.
Other issues:
There are bugs jumping in the bathroom.
It's sweltering in the middle of winter.
The hall smells like wet dog, probably due to the hostel community bathroom down the hallway.
The guests are up all night and bang the doors. You can't sleep here!
Beware! It's centrally located to our track event, but I'll stay at another hotel.
See pictures.
